sentences.en: Cite the examples of the personalized service of the foreign library.
sentences.cn: 举出国外图书馆个性化服务的范例.

sentences.en: Don't cite or reference clients, partners or suppliers without their approval.
sentences.cn: 在未取得客户, 合作伙伴或供应商的同意前,不要引用他们的评论.

sentences.en: Enumeration system processes, can cite the system is currently running process.
sentences.cn: 枚举系统进程, 可以列举出系统当前正在运行的进程.

sentences.en: He continues to cite the article as evidence of his legitimacy.
sentences.cn: 他不断引用该文章作为自己研究合法性的证据.

sentences.en: He may cite previous patents and suggest that they anticipate our claims.
sentences.cn: 他可能列举以前的专利情况,并提出他们的专利申请早于我们.

sentences.en: I can cite quite a few instances to illustrate.
sentences.cn: 我可以举出好几件事来说明.

sentences.en: I cannot cite a like instance.
sentences.cn: 我一时举不出类似的例子.

sentences.en: I'd like to cite my own experience as an example.
sentences.cn: 这里我想拿自己的亲身经历作为例证.

sentences.en: I'll just cite some figures for comparison.
sentences.cn: 我要引用一些数字作比较.

sentences.en: It would be an endless task to cite such living examples.
Let me cite a real - life example to convince the sceptics.
Methods Domestic pigs were chosen for CITE and CPTE models.
sentences.cn: 方法　用白色小家猪制作CITE和CPTE动物模型.

sentences.en: She was cited in the divorce proceedings.
sentences.cn: 她在离婚诉讼中被传唤。

sentences.en: The devil can cite Scripture for his purpose.
sentences.cn: 为了达到目的,魔鬼也会援引圣经.

sentences.en: The judge cited a 1956 Supreme Court ruling in her decision.
sentences.cn: 法官在她的判决中引用了1956年最高法院的一项裁决。

sentences.en: The passage cited above is from a Robert Frost poem.
sentences.cn: 以上的引文出自罗伯特•弗罗斯特的一首诗。

sentences.en: This examples uses the CITE element to render a citation in italic.
sentences.cn: 下面的例子使用了CITE元素将引文以斜体显示.

sentences.en: Too many cases, are too numerous to cite it.
sentences.cn: 案例太多了, 举不胜数呀.

words.tran_cn: 引用，引证；[法] 传票；褒扬

trans.tran_en: to mention something as an example, especially one that supports, proves, or explains an idea or situation

trans.tran_cn: 引用， 引证； 传唤， 传讯； 表彰， 嘉奖
trans.tran_en: to mention something as an example, especially one that supports, proves, or explains an idea or situation
